speaker: SHEPHERD
text: I know not, an ’t like you.

speaker:
SHEPHERD’S
               
              SON
text: Advocate’s the

speaker:
SHEPHERD’S
               
              SON
text: court word for a pheasant. Say you have none.

speaker: SHEPHERD
text: None, sir. I have no pheasant,

speaker: SHEPHERD
text: cock nor hen.

speaker: AUTOLYCUS
text:
How
               
              blest
               
              are
               
              we
               
              that
               
              are
               
              not
               
              simple
               
              men
              !

speaker: AUTOLYCUS
text:
Yet
               
              Nature
               
              might
               
              have
               
              made
               
              me
               
              as
               
              these
               
              are
              .

speaker: AUTOLYCUS
text:
Therefore
               
              I
               
              will
               
              not
               
              disdain
              .

speaker:
SHEPHERD’S
               
              SON
text: This cannot be but a

speaker:
SHEPHERD’S
               
              SON
text: great courtier.

speaker: SHEPHERD
text: His garments are rich, but he wears them

speaker: SHEPHERD
text: not handsomely.

speaker:
SHEPHERD’S
               
              SON
text: He seems to be the more noble in

speaker:
SHEPHERD’S
               
              SON
text: being fantastical. A great man, I’ll warrant. I know

speaker:
SHEPHERD’S
               
              SON
text: by the picking on ’s teeth.

speaker: AUTOLYCUS
text: The fardel there. What’s i’ th’ fardel?

speaker: AUTOLYCUS
text: Wherefore that box?

speaker: SHEPHERD
text: Sir, there lies such secrets in this fardel and

speaker: SHEPHERD
text: box which none must know but the King, and

speaker: SHEPHERD
text: which he shall know within this hour if I may come

speaker: SHEPHERD
text: to th’ speech of him.

speaker: AUTOLYCUS
text: Age, thou hast lost thy labor.

speaker: SHEPHERD
text: Why, sir?

speaker: AUTOLYCUS
text: The King is not at the palace. He is gone

speaker: AUTOLYCUS
text: aboard a new ship to purge melancholy and air

speaker: AUTOLYCUS
text: himself, for, if thou beest capable of things serious,

speaker: AUTOLYCUS
text: thou must know the King is full of grief.

speaker: SHEPHERD
text: So ’tis said, sir—about his son, that should

speaker: SHEPHERD
text: have married a shepherd’s daughter.

speaker: AUTOLYCUS
text: If that shepherd be not in handfast, let him

speaker: AUTOLYCUS
text: fly. The curses he shall have, the tortures he shall

speaker: AUTOLYCUS
text: feel, will break the back of man, the heart of

speaker: AUTOLYCUS
text: monster.

speaker:
SHEPHERD’S
               
              SON
text: Think you so, sir?

speaker: AUTOLYCUS
text: Not he alone shall suffer what wit can

speaker: AUTOLYCUS
text: make heavy and vengeance bitter; but those that are

speaker: AUTOLYCUS
text: germane to him, though removed fifty times, shall

speaker: AUTOLYCUS
text: all come under the hangman—which, though it be

speaker: AUTOLYCUS
text: great pity, yet it is necessary. An old sheep-whistling

speaker: AUTOLYCUS
text: rogue, a ram tender, to offer to have his daughter

speaker: AUTOLYCUS
text: come into grace! Some say he shall be stoned, but

speaker: AUTOLYCUS
text: that death is too soft for him, say I. Draw our throne

speaker: AUTOLYCUS
text: into a sheepcote? All deaths are too few, the sharpest

speaker: AUTOLYCUS
text: too easy.

speaker:
SHEPHERD’S
               
              SON
text: Has the old man e’er a son, sir, do you

speaker:
SHEPHERD’S
               
              SON
text: hear, an ’t like you, sir?

speaker: AUTOLYCUS
text: He has a son, who shall be flayed alive; then

speaker: AUTOLYCUS
text: ’nointed over with honey, set on the head of a

speaker: AUTOLYCUS
text: wasps’-nest; then stand till he be three-quarters and

speaker: AUTOLYCUS
text: a dram dead, then recovered again with aqua vitae

speaker: AUTOLYCUS
text: or some other hot infusion; then, raw as he is, and

speaker: AUTOLYCUS
text: in the hottest day prognostication proclaims, shall

speaker: AUTOLYCUS
text: he be set against a brick wall, the sun looking with a

speaker: AUTOLYCUS
text: southward eye upon him, where he is to behold him

speaker: AUTOLYCUS
text: with flies blown to death. But what talk we of these

speaker: AUTOLYCUS
text: traitorly rascals, whose miseries are to be smiled at,

speaker: AUTOLYCUS
text: their offenses being so capital? Tell me—for you

speaker: AUTOLYCUS
text: seem to be honest plain men—what you have to the

speaker: AUTOLYCUS
text: King. Being something gently considered, I’ll bring

speaker: AUTOLYCUS
text: you where he is aboard, tender your persons to his

speaker: AUTOLYCUS
text: presence, whisper him in your behalfs; and if it be

speaker: AUTOLYCUS
text: in man besides the King to effect your suits, here is

speaker: AUTOLYCUS
text: man shall do it.

speaker:
SHEPHERD’S
               
              SON
text: He seems to be of

speaker:
SHEPHERD’S
               
              SON
text: great authority. Close with him, give him gold; and

speaker:
SHEPHERD’S
               
              SON
text: though authority be a stubborn bear, yet he is oft

speaker:
SHEPHERD’S
               
              SON
text: led by the nose with gold. Show the inside of your

speaker:
SHEPHERD’S
               
              SON
text: purse to the outside of his hand, and no more ado.

speaker:
SHEPHERD’S
               
              SON
text: Remember: “stoned,” and “flayed alive.”

speaker: SHEPHERD
text: An ’t please you, sir, to

speaker: SHEPHERD
text: undertake the business for us, here is that gold I

speaker: SHEPHERD
text: have. I’ll make it as much more, and leave this

speaker: SHEPHERD
text: young man in pawn till I bring it you.

speaker: AUTOLYCUS
text: After I have done what I promised?

speaker: SHEPHERD
text: Ay, sir.

speaker: AUTOLYCUS
text: Well, give me the moiety.

speaker: AUTOLYCUS
text: Are you a party in this business?

speaker:
SHEPHERD’S
               
              SON
text: In some sort, sir; but though my case

speaker:
SHEPHERD’S
               
              SON
text: be a pitiful one, I hope I shall not be flayed out of it.

speaker: AUTOLYCUS
text: O, that’s the case of the shepherd’s son!

speaker: AUTOLYCUS
text: Hang him, he’ll be made an example.

speaker:
SHEPHERD’S
               
              SON
text: Comfort, good comfort.

speaker:
SHEPHERD’S
               
              SON
text: We must to the King, and show our strange

speaker:
SHEPHERD’S
               
              SON
text: sights. He must know ’tis none of your daughter nor

speaker:
SHEPHERD’S
               
              SON
text: my sister. We are gone else.—Sir, I will give you as

speaker:
SHEPHERD’S
               
              SON
text: much as this old man does when the business is

speaker:
SHEPHERD’S
               
              SON
text: performed, and remain, as he says, your pawn till it

speaker:
SHEPHERD’S
               
              SON
text: be brought you.

speaker: AUTOLYCUS
text: I will trust you. Walk before toward the

speaker: AUTOLYCUS
text: seaside. Go on the right hand. I will but look upon

speaker: AUTOLYCUS
text: the hedge, and follow you.

speaker:
SHEPHERD’S
               
              SON
text: We are blessed in this

speaker:
SHEPHERD’S
               
              SON
text: man, as I may say, even blessed.

speaker: SHEPHERD
text: Let’s before, as he bids us. He was provided

speaker: SHEPHERD
text: to do us good.

speaker: AUTOLYCUS
text: If I had a mind to be honest, I see Fortune

speaker: AUTOLYCUS
text: would not suffer me. She drops booties in my

speaker: AUTOLYCUS
text: mouth. I am courted now with a double occasion:

speaker: AUTOLYCUS
text: gold, and a means to do the Prince my master good;

speaker: AUTOLYCUS
text: which who knows how that may turn back to my

speaker: AUTOLYCUS
text: advancement? I will bring these two moles, these

speaker: AUTOLYCUS
text: blind ones, aboard him. If he think it fit to shore

speaker: AUTOLYCUS
text: them again and that the complaint they have to the

speaker: AUTOLYCUS
text: King concerns him nothing, let him call me rogue

speaker: AUTOLYCUS
text: for being so far officious, for I am proof against that

speaker: AUTOLYCUS
text: title and what shame else belongs to ’t. To him will I

speaker: AUTOLYCUS
text: present them. There may be matter in it.
